resources.string:
The app allows users to convert between various temperature units such as Celsius (°C), Fahrenheit (°F), Kelvin (K), and Reamur (°Re). This app is useful for anyone who works with temperature. 

This application made to fulfill the Assessment 01 assignment of the Mobile Devices 1 course.
